title: Benefits and challenges of the public food procurement program: Perspectives of technicians and managers of family farmer organizations in Brazil
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Panmela Soares, Suellen Secchi Martinelli, Elena Albero Atance, Rafaela Fabri, Vicente Clemente-Gómez, Mari Carmen Davó-Blanes, Suzi Barletto Cavalli
